types.html:
séance tenante

  1. (archaic) while the session is open, while we are in session, before the session closes, while the process is still ongoing, while we are here
  2. (law) from the bench; without adjourning to deliberate
  3. (formal) then and there, on the spot, right away, forthwith
    Synonyms: toute affaire cessante, incessamment, sur-le-champ, tout de suite, de ce pas
trans: while the session is open, while we are in session, before the session closes, while the process is still ongoing, while we are here
then and there, on the spot, right away, forthwith

title: séance tenante
pronunHtml: • IPA(key): /se.ɑ̃s tə.nɑ̃t/
